characters.story: "KWAY?" the flowers, teepee and heavens question curiously - are these large-flowered plants, sunflowers?
"LYAO?" the person and pup tent question curiously - is this a coworker, an official bureaucrat?
"LYAO?" the road questions curiously - how far away, distant and remote?
The eyes bend down drooping - to comprehend, understand and grasp!
"LYAO?" the sickness questions curiously - will you cure, treat and heal?
"DUNG!" the eyes command sharply - to glare, stare and gaze!
"DUNG!" he commands sharply - sit on the bench, the stool and seat!
"CHUNG?" the water questions curiously - is it transparent, clear like the untamed?
"PWOH!" the water sings cheerfully - to splash, be spirited and lively!
"BWOH!" the fingers and courier sing cheerfully - to allocate, distribute and provoke!
"SHAN!" the tree and rooster tail sing cheerfully - a fir tree, cedar and conifer!
"BIN!" he sings cheerfully - well-mannered, refined, gentle and urbane!
"SHAN!" the clothes sing cheerfully - a shirt, garment and blouse!
"JAHNG!" it sings cheerfully - manifest, evident, revealing not failures!
"PUNG?" the flesh, drum and rooster tail question curiously - puffy, swollen and bloated?
"CHUN!" he commands sharply - to take advantage of, seize the opportunity!
The words bend down drooping - to diagnose, examine and consult!
"SHUN!" the water commands sharply - to seep, permeate and ooze the stink!
